definition: to have disregard for human life (idiom)
grass/straw/manuscript/draft (of a document)/careless/rough/CL:棵[ke1],撮[zuo3],株[zhu1],根[gen1]
variant of 肏[cao4]
(grass)/Themeda forsbali
man/person/people/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4]
life/fate/order or command/to assign a name, title etc
see 草菅人命[cao3 jian1 ren2 ming4]
with no regard for law or discipline (idiom); flouting the law and disregarding all rules/in complete disorder
to prey on the people
to circumvent the law
corruption and abuse of the law (idiom); to take bribes and bend the law
death cannot wipe out the crimes (idiom); dreadful crimes that rankled even after the perpetrator is dead
guilty of terrible crimes (idiom)/reprehensible
to bend the law in order to favor one's relatives or associates (idiom)
devoid of conscience (idiom); utterly heartless
to take advantage of one's position to bully people (idiom)/to kick people around
willfully slaughter the innocent (idiom)
to act as accomplice to the tiger/to help a villain do evil (idiom)
to break the law and commit crimes (idiom); malefactor/evildoer/to perpetrate outrages
to plot and kill sb for his property (idiom); to murder for money
to oppress the people/to act tyrannically
to know the law and break it (idiom); consciously going against the rules
